headline: Intuitive Surgical (ISRG): Revisiting Valuation After a 25% Three-Month Share Price Surge
summary: Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) has quietly added to its gains over the past 3 months, with the stock up roughly 25% as investors lean into its steady double digit revenue and earnings growth. See our latest analysis for Intuitive Surgical. The recent 25.3% 3 month share price return has added to an already impressive track record, sitting on top of a 3 year total shareholder return of about 113 percent, which suggests momentum is still firmly on Intuitive Surgical's side.
